thread.section_title: Kiddies Kingdom Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Kiddies Kingdom | www.kiddies-kingdom.com | 4 of 121
thread.title: Baffers1001

author: Baffers1001
title: Baffers1001
text:
I purchased my child car seat from here as this was the best price I could find online. In retrospect, I would have happily paid more and purchased through somewhere like Amazon and had better service.
I was promised a delivery date, which was missed (on 3 occasions). I made 3 phonecalls to the company to chase my order. The least amount of time I was on hold for was 20 minutes! They seem to have one customer service rep,and they only work 10-5 and take an hour for lunch where you cannot contact them.
Absolutely none of my emails were answered. The only was I finally had a resolution was through Google as they protected the order. All in all- absolutely awful company, no concept of customer service. Place your business elsewhere.
